title: New: Crook – Captain
content:
This vocal from Irish singer / songwriter Crook really grabs me.

So there’s no shortage of ‘acoustic guitarists’ penning four minute, folk indebted odes to lost-lovers, yet judging by his debut outing, Captain, there could be something more to him. Part Elliott Smith, part A. A. Bondy, it’s delicately composed; certainly one of the most moving tracks I’ve heard this week. Check out Captain below, taken from an EP out next week.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
